name: breakNoUhhhGauntlet
description:
WARNING WEB VERSION RUNS POORLY - PLAY AT OWN RISK
The goal is to travel through the dungeon clearing floors and amassing score.Build up combo by bouncing balls back, combo resets if a ball passes through the back of the paddle.
You can proceed to the next floor once you clear all the mobs and spawners.
You will get bonus points for using less shots per floor

Controls
Movement - wasd/arrow keys
Fire shot - spacebar
rotate paddle - O/P
Shrink player - V
Mute audio - M
Change contrast mode - C
Return to main menu - Escape

Credits

Programming - Me
other art - Me
Player Character "gungirl 1.png" CC3 - https://opengameart.org/content/female-5-8-directions-character-carrying-gun-nes... - made by spring
Musics - http://www.johnleonardfrench.co.uk
SFX - Imphenzia
